Once the buyer accepts the merchandise, {{party_name}} forwards the payment to the seller by writing a check. A typical escrow transaction: When an auction ends, your end of auction email contains links to {{party_name}}. Once you have signed up with {{party_name}} you go through the following steps to complete your transaction. 1. Start a transaction by entering the description and price of the merchandise along with email address of the other party. 2. The other party receives an email from {{party_name}} requesting an acknowledgement of the terms of the transaction. 3. Once the transaction is acknowledged by the other party, the buyer pays {{party_name}} the agreed upon price, by credit card or other means. 4. {{party_name}} informs the seller that payment has been received, requesting them to ship the merchandise directly to the buyer. 5. The seller provides {{party_name}} with the tracking number of the shipment. 6. The buyer receives and accepts the merchandise. {{effective_date}}. {{party_name}} sends the check to the seller.
